# outputs

**Instance Property**

The output destinations to which a captures session sends its data.

## Declaration

```swift
var outputs: [AVCaptureOutput] { get }
```

## Discussion

You add new outputs to a capture session by calling its [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession/addOutput(_:)] method.

## Configuring outputs

- **canAddOutput(_:)**: Determines whether you can add an output to a session.
- **addOutput(_:)**: Adds an output to the capture session.
- **removeOutput(_:)**: Removes an output from a capture session.
